title: Requirement Document
content:

**Author**: Idea-to-Deploy Platform

**Version**: 1.0.0 (Baseline)

# 2. Project Background & Objectives
This project, **Build a healthcare appointment management platform that allows patients to register, book appointments, manage medical profiles, receive notifications, and allows healthcare providers to manage schedules and patient records.**, is designed to deliver a high-quality solution in the **SaaS / Subscription** domain.
